comment: @CyclingMikey @truemagic68 After the city was bombed (IRA) the authorities began closing side street access into and out of the city. Upper & Lwr Thames st's became a bypass with 2 lanes each way. This space has mostly been given over to cycle lane. Eastbound is worse because it has no outlets. https://t.co/7UNtbdOlB4
